mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY n.is_fixed DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.category = #{category} ORDER BY n.is_fixed DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR n.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY n.is_fixed DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_tb SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_fixed = IFNULL(#{is_fixed}, is_fixed), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
